text: Consider- « There is a network having bandwidth of 1 MBps. * Amessage of size 1000 bytes has to be sent. « Packet switching technique is used. « Each packet contains a header of 100 bytes. ) - @ - - Receiver Out of the following, in how many packets the message must be divided so that total time taken is minimum- 1. 1 packet 2. 5 packets 3. 10 packets 4. 20 packets
